name: bros-enterprise-webapp
description: A production-ready enterprise web application with mobile-first responsive design and CI/CD pipeline

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:netlify: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.analyze:bundle: cd frontend && npm run build && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer build/static/js/*.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:frontend -- --fix && npm run lint:backend -- --fix
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:shared
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:build
scripts.setup:deployment: npm run setup:netlify && npm run setup:lighthouse
scripts.mobile:setup: mkdir -p reports && echo 'Mobile testing environment ready'
scripts.mobile:test-devices: echo 'Testing on multiple device sizes...' && npm run lighthouse:mobile
scripts.responsive:check: echo 'Checking responsive design patterns...' && npm run test:mobile
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && cd frontend && npm audit && cd ../backend && npm audit
scripts.security:fix: npm audit fix && cd frontend && npm audit fix && cd ../backend && npm audit fix
scripts.performance:check: npm run lighthouse:mobile && npm run lighthouse:desktop
scripts.performance:analyze: npm run analyze:bundle && npm run analyze:deps
scripts.ci:test: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.ci:deploy: npm run ci:test && npm run deploy:production
scripts.precommit: npm run lint:fix && npm run format

author: Shubhit Talus <taluscpp@gmail.com>
